suggest.amasty/improved-sorting-graphql: Install improved-sorting-graphql module to activate GraphQl and Sorting integration.
suggest.amasty/yotpo: Install amasty/yotpo module to activate Yotpo Reviews and Sorting integration.
suggest.amasty/module-sorting-mftf-2: Install module-sorting-mftf-2 module to implement module's mftf-tests for Magento 2.3.5+ version.
suggest.amasty/module-sorting-mftf-3: Install module-sorting-mftf-3 module to implement module's mftf-tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version.
